description: Basic manufacturing- Builds air units.
Advanced manufacturing- Builds air units.
Scout- Fast. Can see far away. Does not attack.
Base Flyer Description - If you're seeing this, something is wrong in your flyer.
Carpet Bomber- High damage over a wide area. Fragile and slow. Attacks land, sea and undersea targets.
Tactical Bomber- Long range. High damage tactical missiles. Attacks land and sea targets.
Basic fabricator- Wired to build structures.
Advanced fabricator- Wired to build structures.
Fighter- Fast. High damage. Only attacks air targets.
Interplanetary Fighter- Stronger fighter. Can move between planets. Can only attack air targets.
Gunship- Fast. Cheap. Durable. Attacks land and sea targets.
Air Transport- Load a land unit for rapid long distance travel.
For debugging purposes
Base Commander Description - If you're seeing this, something is wrong in your commander.
Mobile Anti-Air- Equipped with homing missiles. Only attacks air.
Anti-Air Defense- Equipped with homing missiles. Only attacks air.
Advanced Anti-Air- Deals heavy damage over an area. Only attacks air.
Anti-nuke launcher- Equipped with advanced anti-nuclear missile weapon.
Anti-nuke - Intercepts incoming nuclear missiles.
Blocks a single nuclear strike in the local area, cannot build more anti-nukes.
Advanced Artillery- Extremely long-range heavy damage. Can lay siege from very far away. Attacks land and sea targets.
Artillery- Long-range damage for siege and area denial purposes. Attacks land and sea targets.
Basic Infantry- Fast, adaptable, expendable. Amphibious. Attacks land, air and sea targets.
Assault Bot- Well-armored. High damage guns and torpedoes. Amphibious. Attacks land and sea.
For debugging purposes
Base Bot Description - If you're seeing this, something is wrong in your bot.
Base Structure Description - If you're seeing this, something is wrong in your structure.
Base Vehicle Description - If you're seeing this, something is wrong in your vehicle.
Combat bot- Equipped with basic anti-air missiles.
Bomb bot- Self-Destructs to deal very heavy damage over an area. Extremely fast.
Basic manufacturing- Builds bots.
Advanced manufacturing- Builds bots.
Fire Support- Long-range. Can fire over walls. Attacks land and sea targets.
Sniper- Long-range. High damage. Slow rate of fire. Intercepts missiles. Attacks land, air and sea targets.
All Terrain Bot: Can crawl almost anywhere.
Mobile Tactical Missile- Long-range. Fires homing missiles. Heavy damage. Attacks land, sea and orbital targets.
Super Weapon- Build five on a metal planet to activate the Annihilazer.
Basic manufacturing- Produces energy.
Advanced manufacturing- Produces energy.
Manufacturing- Increases maximum energy storage capacity.
Basic fabricator- Wired to build structures.
Advanced fabricator- Wired to build structures.
Support Fabricator- Repairs damaged units. Can build and detect mines. Can't help build other structures.
Advanced Support Fabricator- Repairs much faster. Can build turrets in addition to mines.
Basic fabricator- Wired to build structures.
Advanced fabricator- Wired to build structures.
Very durable. Blocks units and protects from incoming fire.
Land mine- Detonates when enemy units are in proximity.
Scout- Fast. Can see far away. Detects mines. Does not attack.
Basic turret- Equipped with direct fire anti-land, and anti-ship defenses.
Advanced turret- Equipped with direct fire anti-land, and anti-ship defenses.
Basic turret- Equipped with direct fire anti-land, and anti-ship defenses.
Basic manufacturing- Produces metal, can only be placed on metal deposits.
Advanced manufacturing- Produces metal, can only be placed on metal deposits.
Manufacturing- Increases maximum metal storage capacity.
Nuclear missile launcher- Equipped with advanced long range, large area damage, nuclear missile.
Nuclear missile - Long range, large area damage, projectile
Basic radar- Detects nearby enemy land, sea, and air units.
Advanced radar- Detects nearby enemy land, sea, and air units.
Tactical Missile Launcher- Very heavy damage. Long-range. Attacks land, sea, and orbital targets.
Flame tank- Short ranged, heavy armored vehicle.
Heavy tank- Advanced short range, heavily armored vehicle.
Mortar tank- Equipped with advanced mobile artillery.
Assault Tank- Devastating damage. Heavy armor. Vulnerable to flanking. Attacks land and sea targets.
Light tank- Well-rounded. Reliable. Attacks land and sea targets.
Teleporter: Teleports units from one to another.
Interplanetary Transport- Builds and launches up to 12 units at once anywhere in the system.
Basic manufacturing- Builds land vehicles.
Advanced manufacturing- Builds land vehicles.
Base Orbital: Why are you seeing this? It's not a full spec.
Base Orbital Structure Description - If you're seeing this, something is wrong in your structure.
Orbital and deepspace radar- Orbital and Celestial radar telemetry.
Defense satellite- Heavy orbital offensive and defensive platform with basic laser.
Delta V Engine- Used to move small to medium celestial bodies.
Ion defense platform- Designed to take out orbital units above it.
Gas mining and metal creation satellite. Only works above gas giant planets.
Advanced fabricator- Builds orbital satellites and ships.
Advanced manufacturing- Builds orbital satellites.
Orbital fighter- Fast moving orbital fighter for offense and defense.
Orbital lander- Load it up, get units to other planets.
Orbital laser platform- Rains death from above.
Basic manufacturing- Builds and launches satellites and other units.
Basic radar satellite- Detects a large area for enemy land, sea, and air units.
Advanced radar satellite- Detects a vast area for enemy land, sea, and air units.
Manufacturing- Orbital energy generation.
Submarine- High damage. Cannot be targeted by cannons. Attacks sea and undersea targets.
Battleship- Long range advanced anti-ship, and anti-land guns.
Destroyer- Long-range. High damage. Very durable. Attacks land, sea and undersea targets.
Basic fabricator- Wired to build naval structures.
Advanced fabricator- Wired to build naval structures.
Frigate- Durable. Rapid-fire. Attacks land, air, and sea targets.
Missile Ship- Long-range. High damage anti-air and tactical missiles. Attacks land, sea, air, and orbital targets.
Basic manufacturing- Builds naval units.
Advanced manufacturing- Builds naval units.
Stealth Sub- Very high damage. Radar stealth. Attacks land, sea, and undersea targets.
Sea mine- Detonates when ships are in proximity.
Gunboat- Cheap. Fast. Expendable. Attacks land and sea targets.
Torpedo Launcher- Basic anti-ship defense.
Torpedo Launcher- Advanced anti-ship defense.
Basic manufacturing- Builds air units.
Advanced manufacturing- Builds air units.
Base Flyer Description - If you're seeing this, something is wrong in your flyer.
Carpet Bomber- High damage over a wide area. Fragile and slow. Attacks land, sea and undersea targets.
Tactical Bomber- Long range. High damage tactical missiles. Attacks land and sea targets.
Siege Bomber- Durable. Slow. Devastating damage. Attacks land and sea targets.
Builder- Builds structures. Very mobile. Vulnerable.
Builder- Builds structures. Very mobile. Vulnerable
Fighter- Fast. High damage. Only attacks air targets.
Interplanetary Fighter- Stronger fighter. Can move between planets. Can only attack air targets.
Gunship- Fast. Cheap. Durable. Attacks land and sea targets.
Solar Drone- Produces energy. Mobile but slow. Weak. Attacks land, air, and sea targets.
Support Platform- Repairs nearby units. Intercepts homing missiles. Does not attack.
Lightning Titan- Heavy damage over a wide area. Attacks any targets except orbital.
Air Transport- Load a land unit for rapid long distance travel.
Base Commander Description - If you're seeing this, something is wrong in your commander.
Anti-nuke launcher- Equipped with advanced anti-nuclear missile weapon.
Anti-nuke - Intercepts incoming nuclear missiles.
Bot Launcher- Builds and fires bots at nearby targets.
Assault Bot- Well-armored. High damage guns and torpedoes. Amphibious. Attacks land and sea.
Base Bot Description - If you're seeing this, something is wrong in your bot.
Base Structure Description - If you're seeing this, something is wrong in your structure.
Base Vehicle Description - If you're seeing this, something is wrong in your vehicle.
Advanced manufacturing- Builds bots.
Nanobot Swarm- Extremely Fast. Cheap. Close range. Devastating damage. Attacks land targets.
Sniper- Long-range. High damage. Slow rate of fire. Intercepts missiles. Attacks land, air and sea targets.
Proxy Commander -- Builds advanced structures. Durable. High damage. Attacks everything but orbital.
Mobile Tactical Missile- Long-range. Fires homing missiles. Heavy damage. Attacks land, sea and orbital targets.
Tesla Bot- Very high damage over an area. Uses energy. Attacks land targets.
Advanced manufacturing- Produces energy.
Builder- Builds structures. Cheap. Fast. Less powerful than other builders.
Builder- Builds advanced structures. Cheap. Fast. Less powerful than other builders.
Support Fabricator- Repairs damaged units. Can build and detect mines. Can't help build other structures.
Advanced Support Fabricator- Repairs much faster. Can build turrets in addition to mines.
Builder- Builds structures. Durable. More powerful than other builders.
Builder- Builds advanced structures. Durable. More powerful than other builders.
Very durable. Blocks units and protects from incoming fire.
Land mine- Detonates when enemy units are in proximity.
Advanced manufacturing- Produces metal, can only be placed on metal deposits.
Nuclear missile launcher- Equipped with advanced long range, large area damage, nuclear missile.
Nuclear missile - Long range, large area damage, projectile
Launches a single advanced long range, large area damage, nuclear missile, can not build more missiles.
Flak Tank- Damage over a very wide area. Only attacks air targets.
Hover Tank- Fast. Can cross water and lava. Attacks land and sea targets.
Mobile Nuke- Detonates a nuke on death. Slow. Extremely durable. Self-destruct attack.
Seismic Titan- Devastating damage to everything nearby. Amphibious. Attacks land, sea, and undersea targets.
Doomsday Titan- Destroys the planet it's built on once finished.
Rolling Fortress- Near invincible. Long-range. Heavy damage. Hover. Attacks land and sea targets.
Interplanetary Transport- Builds and launches up to 12 units at once anywhere in the system.
Advanced manufacturing- Builds land vehicles.
Orbital and deepspace radar- Orbital and Celestial radar telemetry.
Defense Satellite- Area denial. Rapid-fire. Durable. Attacks everything.
Anti-Orbital Defense- Rapid-fire. High damage. Attacks orbital targets. Intercepts drop pods.
Gas mining and metal creation satellite. Only works above gas giant planets.
Orbital Battleship- Rapid-Fire. Very durable. Heavy damage. Attacks everything.
Orbital Carrier- Can load up to 12 units.
Advanced fabricator- Builds orbital satellites and ships.
Advanced manufacturing- Builds orbital satellites.
Orbital Fighter- Fast. Weak. Expendable. Attacks orbital targets.
Orbital lander- Load it up, get units to other planets.
Orbital Fire Support- Heavy damage over an area. Uses energy. Attacks land, sea and air targets.
Basic manufacturing- Builds and launches satellites and other units.
Space Probe- Fast. Cheap. Expendable. Provides ground vision. Does not attack.
Railgun Platform- Long-range. High damage. Very low rate of fire. Uses energy. Attacks orbital.
Manufacturing- Orbital energy generation.
Invasion Titan- Can link with a teleporter and send units directly to a planet's surface. Attacks everything.
Submarine- High damage. Cannot be targeted by cannons. Attacks sea and undersea targets.
Destroyer- Long-range. High damage. Very durable. Attacks land, sea and undersea targets.
Drone Carrier- Builds and launches missile drones at enemies. Attacks land, air and sea targets.
Missile Drone-Fast, fragile, attacks land and air.
Support Barge- Repairs damaged ships. Builds and detects mines. Cannot help build things.
Basic fabricator- Wired to build naval structures.
Advanced fabricator- Wired to build naval structures.
Frigate- Durable. Rapid-fire. Attacks land, air, and sea targets.
Hover Destroyer- Long-Range. Durable. Hover. Attacks land and sea targets.
Advanced manufacturing- Builds naval units.
Torpedo Launcher- Basic anti-ship defense.
Torpedo Launcher- Advanced anti-ship defense.
